data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of the subgenus Ocypus Leach (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylinini) and three new species from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhou, Hong-Zhang (2017): Taxonomy of the subgenus Ocypus Leach (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylinini) and three new species from China. Zootaxa 4312 (2): 293-310, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4312.2.5
